assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The Australian Genomics Acute Care study has Human Research Ethics Committee approval (HREC/16/MH251). Following genetic counselling, parents provided informed written consent for rapid genomic testing.

funder.name: Department of Health | National Health and Medical Research Council
